response.original_title: The Killer Nurse with Trevor McDonald
response.overview: In 1991 22yearold nurse Beverly Allitt murdered four children and attacked a further nine at Grantham Hospital in England Now years after he reported on her conviction Trevor McDonald is able to shed new light on a case that has fascinated him ever since McDonald tracks down several of her surviving victims some of whom are speaking for the first time about their traumatic experiences.
response.title: The Killer Nurse with Trevor McDonald
